comment: Communication is key with Dr. Kemp. It's important to be transparent with him so that he can give you the guidance you need. I felt heard whenever I expressed any concerns. He would provide clarity whenever there was any confusion. I wish I had taken more courses with him.
At first I just took this class because I needed the cre
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This professor is very straight forward

You'll have bi-weekly discussion posts, multiple long weekly readings, quizzes, 2 papers, a midterm, and a final in this class. He gives some extra credit throughout the course. The only downside is he doesn't respond to emails fast and the assignments can be unclear.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT
